title: Number of Days in Month
description: In this lab, we will delve into a JavaScript programming exercise that aims to determine the number of days in a given month of a specified year. Through this lab, you will learn how to use the Date constructor and the getDate() method to calculate the number of days in a month. You will also get a chance to practice your JavaScript skills and gain a better understanding of how date calculations work in JavaScript.

meta.title: Determine the Number of Days in a Month with JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to calculate the number of days in a given month and year.
